entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
